## Return Value

The current controller’s power state. This will be 1 for on, or 0 for off. Only Apple Bluetooth adapters support power off

# powerState

**Instance Property**

Gets the controller power state

## Declaration

```swift
var powerState: BluetoothHCIPowerState { get }
```

## Return Value

The current controller’s power state. This will be 1 for on, or 0 for off. Only Apple Bluetooth adapters support power off
title: powerState
